function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inefficient use of battery capacity due to inaccurate dimensioning based on energy consumption data.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High power consumption from wifi communications","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Vulnerability to software changes due to foss technologies","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for data security breaches during mqtt communication","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Centralization of the ieq monitoring system may lead to a single point of failure for the entire system, increasing the risk of widespread impact if the central system fails.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Alarms are generated when nodes are not working properly, indicating a risk of delayed identification and resolution of node malfunctions.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data captured from smart ieq sensor nodes is stored in text files, posing a risk of data security and integrity.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for contamination of ieq concentrators and monitoring system due to physical interaction with multiple users","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of cloud connectivity may limit the ability to detect and respond to contagious disease outbreaks in real-time","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Storage of data in text files may pose a security risk, leading to unauthorized access and potential data breaches","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ieq sensor nodes connected to the internet potentially vulnerable to cyberattacks","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cloud services accessed from anywhere in the internet increase risk of data breaches","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Wide distribution of smart ieq sensor nodes increases risk of spreading contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to high occupancy in the faculty building","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in the staff office","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate hygiene practices in the laboratory and classroom","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in co2 concentration depending on sensor location","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation during door and window opening","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ieq monitoring system testing without considering infectious disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor ventilation due to open windows","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent temperature and humidity distribution","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Intermittent loss of wifi communication in the laboratory","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in relative humidity levels within the laboratory","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continuous increase in eco2 values despite open windows","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Connection loss due to low wifi signal","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variation in values based on the position of the smart ieq sensor nodes","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate temperature and ventilation control in winter and summer","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate air quality monitoring leading to potential spread of contagious diseases like covid-19.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through smart ieq sensor nodes","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation due to sensor malfunction or misconfiguration","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data security risks related to sensor communication","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global spread of covid-19 leading to significant confirmed cases and deaths","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Crowds and hotspots in urban areas increasing the likelihood of contagion","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Vulnerable groups in high-risk areas near schools and nursing homes","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Identification of risk areas in the city related to contagion propagation.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Identification of areas with the highest risk of contagion based on the occupancy model and knowledge base","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Construction of safe pedestrian routes in a covid-19 pandemic context","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of the proposed service for purposes other than covid-19 safety, such as avoiding sunny areas in summer or closed streets due to events","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on technology for pandemic containment","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Over-reliance on specific technological solutions","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unintended consequences of technology integration","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of effective detection of abnormal patterns in the built environment","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overlap between alert and mitigation applications","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of sensors to detect symptoms may result in false positives or false negatives, leading to incorrect actions or delays in response.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Monitoring devices that track contact with infected people may raise privacy concerns and result in user resistance.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Crowdsourced smartphone data and social network analysis may lead to biased or inaccurate conclusions about the mental state of citizens.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Standard message libraries for pandemic communication may lack cultural sensitivity and relevance to specific populations, leading to miscommunication or distrust.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misinformation about pandemic management","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of communication with vulnerable groups","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on openstreetmap osm data for context parameters","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
